meanings.definition: Relating to the process of solvolysis.
meanings.sent1: The solvolytic reaction was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study the solvolytic properties of different solvents.
meanings.sent3: The solvolytic dance of the molecules in the solution was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her solvolytic approach to problem-solving dissolved all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The solvolytic nature of the solvent made it perfect for the reaction.

meanings.definition: Involving the breakdown of a chemical compound by a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The solvolytic process helped break down the compound effectively.
meanings.sent2: The solvolytic solution slowly dissolved the substance.
meanings.sent3: The solvolytic power of the solvent surprised everyone in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The solvolytic effect of the liquid was like magic on the compound.
meanings.sent5: The solvolytic reaction was so strong that it dissolved the compound in seconds.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a reaction in which a solvent acts as a reactant.
meanings.sent1: The solvolytic properties of the solvent were crucial in the reaction.
meanings.sent2: In the solvolytic reaction, the solvent played an active role.
meanings.sent3: The solvolytic behavior of the solvent caught the researchers by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The solvolytic solvent seemed to have a mind of its own in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The solvolytic interaction between the solvent and the compound was fascinating to observe.
